name: Quiet Eye of the Dragon
description: Worn on a finger, this item increases your Attack and Defense skills by +1.

name: Ring of Conjuring
description: Worn on a finger, this item increases the duration of all your spells by 2.

name: Still Eye of the Dragon
description: Worn on the finger, this item increases your Luck and Morale by +1.

name: Ring of Vitality
description: This item increases the health of all your units by +1.

name: Ring of Life
description: This item increases the health of all your units by +1.

name: Equestrian's Gloves
description: Worn on the hands, these gloves increase your hero's movement rate over land.

name: Diplomat's Ring
description: Worn on the finger, the Diplomat's Ring reduces the cost of surrendering.

name: Eversmoking Ring of Sulfur
description: When worn, this ring increases your Sulfur production by +1 per day.

name: Ring of Infinite Gems
description: When worn, this ring increases your Gem production by +1 per day.

name: Ring of the Wayfarer
description: When placed on the finger, this ring increases the combat speed of all your units by +1.
